== Panangad (CT) (627878) ==

Panangad (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 7.68 sq. km. and harbouring 3864 households with total population of 15630 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 44 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 298 km. Male population is 7392 and female population is 8238. Scheduled Caste population is 1946 and Scheduled Tribes population is 10. Census Location Code of the town is 627878<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 44 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 36 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 23 km.
